Name: Prepare DPS BURN
checklistText:
<size=21>EPS PREPARATION FOR DPS BURN</size>

1.	Perform EPS Basic (Unstaged), except:

Panel 11:
	CB EPS: INV 1 - close

Panel 14:
2.	Check a-c voltage from inverter No. 1:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - AC BUS
		INVERTER ew - 1
		VOLTS ind - green band

		CAUTION

	Twenty minutes before start of DPS burn,
	ascent batteries must be placed on-line
	in parallel with descent batteries. CB
	EPS: CROSS TIE BAL LOADS (2) must remain
	closed until just before start of burn.

3.	Place both ascent batteries on line:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 5
		VOLTS ind - 31, 5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amps
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 6
		VOLTS ind - 31.5 to 37.2 vdc
		AMPS ind - 0 amps
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED sw - ON; tb - gray
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		AMPS ind - TBD

Panel 14:
4.	Check voltage of all six batteries:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - BAT 1
		VOLTS ind - 28.0 to 32.5 vdc
		Repeat check for BAT 2, 3, 4, 5, & 6

5.	Check d-c voltage on both buses:
	EPS:
		POWER/TEMP MON sel - LMP BUS
		VOLTS ind - 26.5 to 32.5 vdc

6.	EPS: POWER/TEMP MON sel - CDR BUS
